item.description: Structure Fire - NOW OUT; INC#1606; 08:23PM; 1411 S Toberman St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3YtuJqN; Pico-Union; Firefighters fully extinguished a RV and tree fire in 20 minutes - preventing it from extending into any structures. An adult female was located on the ground, next to the RV (outside) with no apparent burn or respiratory injuries. The patient in being transported in fair condition. There are no other injuries reported. The 9-1-1 call was received at 8:03PM. No further details.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 E10 E11 E13 E210 E211 E215 RA810 RA9 SQ21 T10 T11 T15; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Technical Rescue; INC#0425; 07:59AM; 5601 N De Soto Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Y5fAw4; Woodland Hills; An adult male construction worker fell approximately 20' down into a concrete hole (was dug out and already poured) and appears to have sustained non-life threatening injuries. It is not a trench nor confined space rescue. Firefighters are preparing for a litter basket operation using the aerial ladder truck to safely secure the patient and bring him to surface level for ground transport. The incident will scale down with a number of units being released and canceled enroute. No further details and no further updates are anticipated.; FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC10 BC17 E288 E293 E84 E88 E93 EM17 HR3 RA106 RA827 RA88 T88 T93 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Gold Line TA, Vehic; INC#1128; 04:49PM; 202 N Av 59; MAP: https://bit.ly/40tE7N4; Highland Park; One patient is being transported in critical condition (age/gender unknown). There was no extrication required, the patient was clear of the train. There are no other patients (no injuries on the train). The tracks are closed and riders are advised to follow @metrolosangeles on twitter for updates. LAPD Inc# 2644. No further details.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC13 BC2 E12 E212 E55 EM1 HR3 RA12 T12; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

title.a: Update Cliff Rescue - Hoist Op 02/04/2023 INC#1220

item.description: Update Cliff Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#1220; 05:21PM; 8543 Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Yg9qJk; Beverly Crest; Due to the severity of injuries to the patient and the terrain, LAFD Air Ops will conduct a hoist operation and air ambulance transport (patient is in *at least* serious condition). . The vehicle is resting against a tree and is not stable. Firefighters are working to stabilize the vehicle and Heavy Rescue rig is enroute to assess the situation. Mulholland Dr will remain closed from Laurel Canyon to Coldwater Canyon until the operation is complete. Drivers are advised to seek alternate routes No further details. ; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AO2 BC14 BC5 E278 E288 E289 E97 EM14 H2 H4 H5 HA2 HA4 HR3 RA88 RA89 RA97 RH114 T78 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Cliff, Vehicle; INC#1220; 05:16PM; 8543 Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Yg9qJk; Beverly Crest; Firefighters located the 35yo female patient is outside of the vehicle (no entrapment and no other patients) with serious injuries. Traffic closure: Crews are closing Mulholland Dr at Laurel Canyon and Coldwater Canyon - drivers are advised to avoid the area. Firefighters are preparing for a two line rope system using a litter basket while LAFD Air Ops is enroute and will lower a medic to assist in evaluating the patient. Incident Commander will determine the best method of retrieving the patient. ; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AO2 BC14 BC5 E278 E288 E289 E97 EM14 H2 H4 HA2 HA4 HR3 RA88 RA89 RA97 RH114 T78 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Cliff, Vehicle; INC#1220; 04:59PM; 8543 Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Yg9qJk; Beverly Crest; A passenger vehicle is down approximately 100' a relatively steep embankment. Firefighters have visual contact of one patient, outside the vehicle. It is unknown if there are any other patients at this time. Crews are making their way down to the vehicle.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AO2 BC14 BC5 E278 E288 E289 E97 EM14 H2 H4 HA2 HA4 HR3 RA88 RA89 RA97 RH114 T78 T88 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Op; INC#0475; 09:37AM; 9299 Canter Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3jpxefb; Shadow Hills; Firefighters located the adult male hiker with a non-life threatening lower leg injury. Due to the terrain and location, LAFD Air Ops will conduct a hoist operation. 9-1-1 call received at 9:15AM. No further details.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E289 E77 H4 H5 HA4 HA5 RA77 RA898 RH114 T89; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0318; 07:16AM; 15249 W Victory Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Y2jIwN; Van Nuys; KNOCKDOWN: 66 firefighters extinguished the fire in 41 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire extended up into the attic and at least one room in the building. The business, Chase Bank, was not yet open for the day and no one was present. LAPD are responding to secure the building. LADOT have traffic closed at Victory / Sepulveda and drivers are advised to avoid the area (do NOT drive over the 4' yellow supply lines that may be in the street) for the next several hours. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation. No further details.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E100 E239 E287 E288 E289 E290 E39 E88 E89 E90 E93 EM14 EM17 HR3 RA39 RA839 RA889 T39 T87 T88 T89 T90 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0318; 07:03AM; 15249 W Victory Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Y2jIwN; Van Nuys; The fire extended into the attic and additional resources were requested - raising this incident to a Greater Alarm status. Firefighters remain in the offensive mode with a coordinated vertical ventilation roof operation and interior fire attack, working to locate and isolate the attic fire while conducting salvage operations on the interior to protect property. No injuries reported.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC12 BC14 BC5 CM42 E100 E239 E287 E288 E289 E290 E39 E88 E89 E90 E93 EM14 EM17 HR3 RA39 RA839 RA889 T39 T87 T88 T89 T90 UR88 UR89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0318; 06:25AM; 6400 N Sepulveda Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lc6kaQ; Van Nuys; One story (50' x 50') commercial building (DBA Chase Bank) with an outside fire that extended in to at least one room of the structure. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E288 E39 E88 RA39 T88; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart
